constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 108 (Friday, June 24, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 8234.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 18 allows Congress to make all
laws ``which shall be necessary and proper for carrying into
execution'' any ``other'' powers vested by the Constitution
in the Government of the United States.
[Page H5919]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]

title: Pacific Island Aviator Development Act
